meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of former times, ancient.
meanings.sent1: The olden castle stood tall on the hill.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy stories of olden days.
meanings.sent3: In the olden days, knights rode horses everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The olden traditions were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The olden ruins whispered tales of the past.

meanings.sent1: Time can olden photographs, making them yellow.
meanings.sent2: Leaving items in the sun can olden them quickly.
meanings.sent3: She tried to olden her appearance for the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The antique shop had a magical ability to olden any item.
meanings.sent5: The potion had the power to olden objects instantly.
